title: How were old high-end computers from the 70s-80s of any use to businesses and scientists? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most business PC’s in the 80’s used office applications, list Word, Lotus 123, Multimate etc. Paired with a printer it was the easiest way to electronically manage documents. Business computers in the 70’s were often custom/ specialized and expensive, the IBM PC’s were probably the first of the general purpose computers. For purists the first Apple Mac was January 24, 1984. I was 13 at the time.

Gee, the computer they used in the moor lander had about as much as a Commodore 64 Meh, it was probably just there for decoration. Most of the uses were purely mathematics. Look up an old programming language “fortran”.
